page.title: 10Events in Dinnington
page.content: Every year{Dinnington Village}holds a {Show.}There are different classes for entries - flowers, vegetables, senior citizens, industrial, children and Dinnington School children. In the morning the entries are displayed, judged and then the Show is open to visitors. The{Dinnington Festival}is a week of special events,beginning on a Saturday with a Gala packed with fun and entertainment. Different events are held each night during the week and the grand ending of the Festival is a Gymkana held on the second Saturday. Dinnington enters{Britain in Bloom} this is a national competition. Everyone tries to keep the Village tidy and colourful. The judges visit in Spring and late Summer.Dinnington usually gains an award.
